"Kitabi-Dede Gorgud" is the national wealth of the Azerbaijani people.
This work reflects the past lifestyles, habits and psychology of the Azerbaijani people.
The names of the heroes of the work can be seen in numerous settlements of Azerbaijan. In this work Azerbaijani toponyms are reflected.
The epic "Kitabi-Dede Gorgud" is a written monument of Azerbaijani folklore. This saga is dear to every Azerbaijani.
Raising the monument to Dada Gorgud today is a manifestation of the Azerbaijani people's attitude towards their past and culture.
@sakika I am sure that the party will choose the best they have. Whoever will be chosen will have given his/her consent@MauriceMugisha @Gil
@Isacyour support is very much appreciated @jmakumbi @MauriceMugisha @Gilespies
Until the 1950s, Kitabi Dada Korkut was banned in the Soviet Union.
However, after 1950s, this work began to be explored as a result of the efforts of Azerbaijani scientists.
Scientific works related to the study of this work belong to Azerbaijani scientists.
This once again shows that this work belongs to our people, the whole Turkic world.
There is a special attitude to the epos "Kitabi Dada Gorgud" in Azerbaijan.
The geographical concept of the Oghuz elite covers all Azerbaijani territories.
@Isacmpanga so what do you mean?@HTumushabe @jmakumbi @MauriceMugisha @Gilespies

Promotion of the work by the recommendation of national leader Heydar Aliyev in 1970-1980, his Soviet, world (cont) http://t.co/H5PaIljkgx
A feature film was shot in the 1970s by the recommendation of the Great Leader. Encyclopedia "Dada Gorgud" was published.
Then, during the years of independence, in 1993-2003, great work has been done to convey this epic to the world community.
In 2000, the 1300th anniversary of the saga was held in Baku solemnly. All Turkic-speaking countries (cont) http://t.co/FmXKdNYWOC
The Great Leader Heydar Aliyev issued an Order on the Dada Gorgud statue.
All this once again shows that Dada Gorgud has always lived, lived and will live in the hearts of the Azerbaijani people.
The epic "Kitabi-Dede Gorgud" is also closely linked to the entire Turkic world.
Azerbaijan does its best for the closer integration of Turkic-speaking states.
This is an integral part of our foreign policy, one of the key directions.
Summit meetings of heads of Turkic-speaking countries in Azerbaijan are a clear proof of this.
These Summit meetings in Baku, Nakhchivan and Gabala are closely linked to the Turkic world.
At the last summit, I mentioned that I would like to say that the 21st century should be the century of Turkic world.
Developments in the Turkish world, mutually beneficial cooperation, positive demographic dynamics, of course, will keep us going (cont) http://t.co/JhxfmXd0c8
Of course, our countries are closely linked to political interests and economic cooperation.
However, we have common history, historical roots, as well as the epic "Kitabi Dada Gorgud" plays a major role here.
